The image was published on a specific Fa: 2020, and has been shared more than 130 times.
The letter in the image is purportedly w: the leader of Jamaat-e-Islami (JI), and is addressed to his followers on February 2, 2020.
The post: s Urdu caption translates to English as a praise for the suggestion given by Jamaat-e-Islami and its leader, Siraj ul Haq, regarding increasing followers by stopping contraceptive use.
Shamsuddin Amjad: the social media director for Jamaat-e-Islami, stated that the letter is fabricated and false, and that it was published by miscreant elements to assassinate the character of the party's leader.
